headline: Auto Roundup: GNTX to Acquire VOXX, F Secures EV Battery Loan & More
summary: Gentex plans to acquire VOXX in an all-cash deal valued at $7.50 per share. Ford and SK On secure $9.6 billion EV battery loan.
